home.name: Adrien Watrelot
home.title: Full-Stack Developer
home.description: Passionate about creating modern and performant web experiences. Specialized in front-end and back-end development.

about.title: About me
about.intro_description: Final-year student in application development, I am passionate about creating modern and performant web experiences. My training and professional experiences have allowed me to develop strong skills in front-end and back-end development, as well as adaptability and professional rigor.
about.intro_goal: My goal is to continue developing my skills while contributing to enriching projects in a stimulating professional environment.
about.exp_helmo_desc: Integration into the IT department's development team to participate in the technological overhaul of the internal portal for staff and students. Applied skills acquired in training, worked using agile methodology, and actively participated in project meetings.
about.exp_taverne_desc: Complete bar management, customer service, cash management, and training of new team members. Developed skills in stress management, conflict resolution, and teamwork under pressure.
about.exp_colona_desc: Responsible for the end of the production line, coordinating with all actors to ensure product compliance before shipping or storage.
about.edu_bachelor_desc: Comprehensive software development training covering front-end and back-end technologies, databases, software architecture, and agile methodologies.
about.skills_highlight_desc: Throughout my academic and professional journey, I have developed expertise in several areas of web development.
about.cta_text: Interested in my profile? Feel free to contact me!
